definition: The Man Shrugging, Type-3 emoji is a sequence of the ?? Shrug, ?? Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-3, ? Male Sign and ? Variation Selector-16 http://emojipedia.org/man-shrugging-type-3/
name: man shrugging: medium-light skin tone

bn:00093698v: Raise one's shoulders to indicate indifference or resignation
To raise (the shoulders) to express uncertainty, lack of concern, (formerly) dread, etc.
To raise the shoulders to express a lack of knowledge or certainty.
To raise the shoulders to express uncertainty, lack of concern, etc.

bn:00087189v: Consider unlikely or have doubts about

bn:00071367n: A lifting of the shoulders to signal indifference.
A shrug is a gesture that is performed by lifting both shoulders up, and is a representation of an individual either not knowing an answer to a question, or not caring about a result.

bn:00028425n: Doubt, a status between belief and disbelief, involves uncertainty or distrust or lack of sureness of an alleged fact, an action, a motive, or a decision.
Doubt is uncertainty in the context of trust, action, decision or belief.
The state of being unsure of something
A status between belief and disbelief, involves uncertainty or distrust or lack of sureness of an alleged fact, an action, a motive, or a decision
Challenge about the truth or accuracy of a matter.

bn:00045892n: The condition of being uninformed or uneducated. Lack of knowledge or information.
Ignorance is the condition of being uninformed or uneducated; i.e., lacking knowledge or information.
The lack of knowledge or education
Ignorance is a state of being uninformed.
Condition of being uninformed or uneducated.

bn:00004840n: Apathy is most commonly defined as a lack of feeling, emotion, interest, or concern.
A lack of interest; indifference, apathy.
State of indifference or the suppression of emotions
Apathy is a lack of feeling, emotion, interest, or concern.
Complete lack of emotion or motivation about a person, activity, or object; depression; lack of interest or enthusiasm; disinterest.
The trait of lacking enthusiasm for or interest in things generally.
The trait of lacking enthusiasm for or interest in things generally

bn:13754407n: The act of one who shrugs.

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)
